txt.en: The abandoned mines of Sundergrót still hold valuable ore and treasures, ripe for the taking. However, the goblin intruders stand in your way….\n\nYour mission is to retrieve valuable ore from Sundergrót.
You have been tasked with retrieving valuable ore from Sundergrót.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'Are you familiar with Sundergrót, the abandoned mines in the Floodfells? It's been overrun by goblins, but it is still rich with ore! I know you're brave enough to handle this, so I am tasking you with infiltrating Sundergrót and retrieving as much ore as you can carry. It will be made into armour and weapons vital to the war effort!'
Your mission is to retrieve ore from Sundergrót.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Sundergrót,
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!
'Well done! This ore will be made into weapons and armour befitting our grand army! Be proud of your contribution, [placeholder]!'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
